@@ -210,0 +210,24 @@
+vendor.argument=<vendor>
+
+vendor.description=\
+Override the vendor string baked into the build, if any.\n\
+The value of the system property "java.vendor" will be <vendor>.
+
+vendor.usage=\
+\  --vendor <vendor>\n\
+\                            Override the vendor string baked into the build,\n\
+\                            if any. The value of the system property\n\
+\                            "java.vendor" will be <vendor>.
+
+vendor-url.argument=<vendor-url>
+
+vendor-url.description=\
+Override the vendor bug URL baked into the build.  The value\n\
+of the system property "java.vendor.url" will be <vendor-url>.
+
+vendor-url.usage=\
+\  --vendor-url <vendor-url>\n\
+\                            Override the vendor bug URL baked into the build.\n\
+\                            The value of the system property\n\
+\                            "java.vendor.url" will be <vendor-url>.
+
